verses.verse: Christ <S%G5547><s%> Then <S%G3767><s%> Having Suffered <S%G3958><s%> For <S%G5228><s%> Us <S%G2257><s%> In The Flesh, <S%G4561><s%> Also <S%G2532><s%> Ye <S%G5210><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Same <S%G846><s%> Mind <S%G1771><s%> Arm Yourselves With; <S%G3695><s%> For <S%G3754><s%> He That <S%G3588><s%> Suffered <S%G3958><s%> In The <S%G1722><s%> Flesh <S%G4561><s%> Has Done With <S%G3973><s%> Sin; <S%G266><s%>

<S%G1519><s%> <S%G3588><s%> No Longer <S%G3371><s%> Men's <S%G444><s%> To Lusts, <S%G1939><s%> But <S%G235><s%> To Will <S%G2307><s%> God's <S%G2316><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Remaining <S%G1954><s%> In The <S%G1722><s%> Flesh <S%G4561><s%> To Live <S%G980><s%> Time. <S%G5550><s%>

<S%G713><s%> For Is Sufficient <S%G1063><s%> For Us <S%G2254><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Past <S%G3928><s%> Time <S%G5550><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of Life <S%G979><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Will <S%G2307><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Nations <S%G1484><s%> , To Have Worked Out, <S%G2716><s%> Having Walked <S%G4198><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> Licentiousness, <S%G766><s%> Lusts, <S%G1939><s%> Wine Drinking, <S%G3632><s%> Revels, <S%G2970><s%> Drinkings, <S%G4224><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Unhallowed <S%G111><s%> Idolatries. <S%G1495><s%>

<S%G1722><s%> Wherein <S%G3739><s%> They Think It Strange <S%G3579><s%> Not <S%G3361><s%> Running With Them <S%G4936><s%> Your <S%G5216><s%> To <S%G1519><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Same <S%G846><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of Dissoluteness <S%G810><s%> Overflow, <S%G401><s%> Speaking Evil Of You ; <S%G987><s%>

Who <S%G3739><s%> Shall Render <S%G591><s%> Account <S%G3056><s%> To Him <S%G3588><s%> Ready <S%G2093><s%> Who Is <S%G2192><s%> To Judge The <S%G2919><s%> Living <S%G2198><s%> And The <S%G2532><s%> Dead. <S%G3498><s%>

<S%G1519><s%> <S%G5124><s%> For To This End <S%G1063><s%> Also <S%G2532><s%> To The Dead <S%G3498><s%> Were The Glad Tidings Announced, <S%G2097><s%> That <S%G2443><s%> They Might Be Judged <S%G2919><s%> Indeed <S%G3303><s%> As Regards <S%G2596><s%> Men <S%G444><s%> In The Flesh; <S%G4561><s%> <S%G2198><s%> But Might Live <S%G1161><s%> As Regards <S%G2596><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> In The Spirit. <S%G4151><s%>

<S%G3956><s%> But Of All Things <S%G1161><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> End <S%G5056><s%> Has Drawn Near : <S%G1448><s%> Be Sober Minded <S%G4993><s%> Therefore, <S%G3767><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Be Watchful <S%G3525><s%> Unto <S%G1519><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Prayers; <S%G4335><s%>

Before <S%G4253><s%> All Things <S%G3956><s%> But <S%G1161><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Among <S%G1519><s%> Yourselves <S%G1438><s%> Love <S%G26><s%> Fervent <S%G1618><s%> Having, <S%G2192><s%> Because <S%G3754><s%> Love <S%G26><s%> Will Cover <S%G2572><s%> A Multitude <S%G4128><s%> Of Sins; <S%G266><s%>
Hospitable <S%G5382><s%> To <S%G1519><s%> One Another, <S%G240><s%> Without <S%G427><s%> Murmurings; <S%G1112><s%>

Each <S%G1538><s%> According As <S%G2531><s%> He Received <S%G2983><s%> A Gift, <S%G5486><s%> To <S%G1519><s%> Each Other <S%G1438><s%> It <S%G846><s%> Serving, <S%G1247><s%> As <S%G5613><s%> Good <S%G2570><s%> Stewards <S%G3623><s%> Of The Various <S%G4164><s%> Grace <S%G5485><s%> Of God. <S%G2316><s%>

If <S%G1487><s%> Anyone <S%G5100><s%> Speaks <S%G2980><s%> As <S%G5613><s%> Oracles <S%G3051><s%> Of God; <S%G2316><s%> If <S%G1487><s%> Anyone <S%G5100><s%> Serves <S%G1247><s%> As <S%G5613><s%> Of <S%G1537><s%> Strength <S%G2479><s%> Which <S%G3739><s%> Supplies <S%G5524><s%> <S%G3588><s%> God; <S%G2316><s%> That <S%G2443><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> All Things <S%G3956><s%> May Be Glorified <S%G1392><s%> <S%G3588><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> Through <S%G1223><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ, <S%G5547><s%> To Whom <S%G3739><s%> Is <S%G2076><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Glory <S%G1391><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Might <S%G2904><s%> To <S%G1519><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Ages <S%G165><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Ages. <S%G165><s%> Amen. <S%G281><s%>

Beloved, <S%G27><s%> <S%G3361><s%> Take Not As Strange <S%G3579><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Amongst <S%G1722><s%> You <S%G5213><s%> Fire Of Persecution <S%G4451><s%> For <S%G4314><s%> Trial <S%G3986><s%> To You Which Is <S%G5213><s%> Taking Place, <S%G1096><s%> As If <S%G5613><s%> A Strange Thing <S%G3581><s%> To You <S%G5213><s%> Is Happening; <S%G4819><s%>

But <S%G235><s%> According As <S%G2526><s%> Ye Have Share <S%G2841><s%> In The <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of Christ <S%G5547><s%> Sufferings, <S%G3804><s%> Rejoice, <S%G5463><s%> That <S%G2443><s%> Also <S%G2532><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Revelation <S%G602><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of Glory <S%G1391><s%> His <S%G846><s%> Ye Mat Rejoice <S%G5463><s%> Exulting. <S%G21><s%>

If <S%G1487><s%> Ye Are Reproached <S%G3679><s%> In The <S%G1722><s%> Name <S%G3686><s%> Of Christ, <S%G5547><s%> Blessed Are Ye ; <S%G3107><s%> Because <S%G3754><s%> The Spirit <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of Glory <S%G1391><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of God <S%G2316><s%> Spirit <S%G4151><s%> ' Upon <S%G1909><s%> You <S%G5209><s%> Rests; <S%G373><s%> <S%G2596><s%> <S%G3303><s%> On Their Part <S%G846><s%> , He Is Blasphemed, <S%G987><s%> <S%G2596><s%> <S%G1161><s%> But On Your Part <S%G5209><s%> Glorified. <S%G1392><s%>

<S%G3361><s%> Assuredly Not <S%G1063><s%> Anyone <S%G5100><s%> Of You <S%G5216><s%> Let Suffer <S%G3958><s%> As <S%G5613><s%> A Murderer, <S%G5406><s%> Or <S%G2228><s%> Thief, <S%G2812><s%> Or <S%G2228><s%> Evil Doer, <S%G2555><s%> Or <S%G2228><s%> As <S%G5613><s%> Overlooker Of Other People's Matters; <S%G244><s%>

<S%G1487><s%> But If <S%G1161><s%> As <S%G5613><s%> A Christian, <S%G5546><s%> Not <S%G3361><s%> Let Him Be Ashamed, <S%G153><s%> <S%G1392><s%> But Let Him Glorify <S%G1161><s%> <S%G3588><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Respect <S%G3313><s%> This. <S%G5129><s%>

Because <S%G3754><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Time For <S%G2540><s%> <S%G3588><s%> To Have Begun <S%G756><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Judgment <S%G2917><s%> From <S%G575><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> House <S%G3624><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of God Is Come ; <S%G2316><s%> <S%G1487><s%> But If <S%G1161><s%> First <S%G4412><s%> ' From <S%G575><s%> Us, <S%G2257><s%> What <S%G5101><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> End <S%G5056><s%> Of Those <S%G3588><s%> Disobeying <S%G544><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of God <S%G2316><s%> Glad Tidings? <S%G2098><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> If <S%G1487><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Righteous <S%G1342><s%> With Difficulty <S%G3433><s%> Is Saved, <S%G4982><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Ungodly <S%G765><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Sinner <S%G268><s%> Where <S%G4226><s%> Shall Appear? <S%G5316><s%>

Wherefore <S%G5620><s%> Also <S%G2532><s%> They Who <S%G3588><s%> Suffer <S%G3958><s%> According To <S%G2596><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Will <S%G2307><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of God <S%G2316><s%> As <S%G5613><s%> To A Faithful <S%G4103><s%> Creator <S%G2939><s%> Let Him Commit <S%G3908><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G5590><s%> Their Souls <S%G1438><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> Well Doing. <S%G16><s%>
